Title: Relates to the effectiveness of provisions of law relating to abatement of tax payments for certain industrial and commercial properties in a city of one million or more persons
Summary: Relates to the effectiveness of provisions of law relating to abatement of tax payments for certain industrial and commercial properties in a city of one million or more persons.
LawCode: Amd Part SS ยง10, Chap 56 of 2020
ActClause: AN ACT to amend part SS of chapter 56 of the laws of 2020, amending the real property tax law and the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to abatement of tax payments for certain industrial and commercial properties in a city of one million or more persons, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
